meanings.definition: Not made larger or more distinct by a lens or magnifying device.
meanings.sent1: The tiny insect looked even smaller when viewed through the unmagnified glass.
meanings.sent2: The details of the painting were clear even when seen through an unmagnified lens.
meanings.sent3: She claimed her unmagnified fish story was as big as a whale!
meanings.sent4: His unmagnified talent for storytelling painted vivid pictures in the listeners' minds.
meanings.sent5: The unmagnified view of the stars on a clear night was breathtaking.

meanings.definition: Not increased in size or scale.
meanings.sent1: The unmagnified toy car was the same size as the real one.
meanings.sent2: The unmagnified map showed the true proportions of the city.
meanings.sent3: He proudly displayed his unmagnified collection of tiny figurines.
meanings.sent4: Her unmagnified courage shone brightly in the face of adversity.
meanings.sent5: The unmagnified flower in the garden was just as beautiful as the rest.

meanings.sent1: His story was simple and unmagnified, without any added drama.
meanings.sent2: The report presented the facts in an unmagnified manner.
meanings.sent3: She preferred her coffee unmagnified, without any extra flavors.
meanings.sent4: His unmagnified emotions were raw and genuine.
meanings.sent5: The unmagnified truth was refreshing in a world of exaggerations.
